definition: (of a publisher) to send a manuscript off to the printer/(of a journalist) to send a dispatch
piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article
to submit articles for publication/to contribute (writing)
(of a newspaper) to stop accepting incoming articles
fee paid to an author for a piece of writing

sentences.english: The feasibility of applying fuzzy mathematics method to appraise manuscript quality is studied. How to apply Method No.
sentences.chinese: 探討應用模糊數學方法評價論文稿質量的可行性。

sentences.english: She has contributed to literary magazines.
sentences.chinese: 她給幾家文學刊物投了稿。

sentences.english: Some gardeners plant potatoes under straw, or stems of dried grain.
sentences.chinese: 一些園藝家在稿杆或曬乾了的穀物莖杆下中土豆。

sentences.english: The first draft of his novel needed a substantial amount of rewriting.
sentences.chinese: 他小說的第一稿需要作大量的重寫。

sentences.english: His article was crowded out of the magazine.
sentences.chinese: 他的文章由於雜誌稿多而被擠掉。

sentences.english: Write a second draft that accommodates new material and revisions.
sentences.chinese: 寫出添加了新材料並修訂過的第二稿。

sentences.english: Answer on the last page of the script.
sentences.chinese: 答案在文字稿最後一頁。

sentences.english: Chapter four is a comparison of my first draft and the published translation.
sentences.chinese: 第四章爲筆者所譯《漂鳥集》初譯稿與出版稿的比較。

sentences.english: On Revenue avenue, the grave traveler jumped the gravestone bravely .
sentences.chinese: 在稿收大道上，嚴肅的旅行者勇敢地跳過墓碑。

sentences.english: "The 7 draft" broke our country market zhongyuan some balance.
sentences.chinese: “第七稿”打破了我國快遞市場中原有的平衡。

sentences.english: She went through the typescript carefully to eliminate all errors from it.
sentences.chinese: 她仔細導語打字稿，以消除所有差錯。

sentences.english: Preserve your font and paragraph editing with Format Printing.
sentences.chinese: 依照你的排版和字體打印出成稿。

sentences.english: This handy little feature will help you catch typos very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 這個便捷的小功能將幫助快速捕獲打字稿。

sentences.english: The overhead projector is useful here, as it enables you to use your marked transcript as a reference for the students.
sentences.chinese: 老師可以利用投影儀向學生展示自己標註的文字稿。

sentences.english: The programme looks at useful phrases for structuring answers in a job interview.
sentences.chinese: 答案在本期節目文字稿的最後一頁。

definition: to submit articles for publication/to contribute (writing)
rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article
to go to press/to submit for printing
old variant of 刊[kan1]/to peel with a knife/to carve/to amend
